channel.title: metaphor on RadioBed
channel.description: Recent content in metaphor on RadioBed

item.title: Soul Film
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Metaphor: The human soul is like a film Born completely empty of anything worldly, no light has touched the surface of the film up to the moment of birth. This is a new soul; a blank film.

item.title: The Plan
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: What must go on in that mind? I get it. I often wonder the same thing and can find myself spiralling into these introspective circles. Accomplishments As an outthinker of conscious beings on and off planet, I have reached some of my greatest accomplishments

item.title: Soul Film Definitions
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Film Spirit Film is a metaphor to describe the human concept of a spirit. Additional efforts to allow the human spirit to be described in attributes similar to those used to describe these new conscious beings such as scanners Scanner

item.title: Soul Film New Game
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)

item.title: Soul Film Reincarnate
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Lets explore The Secret and Reincarnation with regard to the Soul as a Film. When as film is used, colors form from developing the burning of light onto it self.
